author: glyn
msg: Fix bug in CalendarSerializer. Dates were being serialized using the local
timezone and deserialized as if they were GMT. This caused problems when
daylight savings time was in use locally. These dates are now serialized to
Also commmit the extra diagnostics added to the testcase for future reference.
